Name: Veggie Menace
About the game: During a vegetable contest in the Middle Ages, one of the participants tried to cheat by casting a spell to make their vegetables bigger. It fails and ends up bringing the vegetables to life. Due to this situation, the villagers call Megi, a powerful little traveling witch with magic powers in order to protect their hoses and finish with the vegetable’s invasion. To do this, Megi will need to go through the outside of the village into the main castle trying to find the invasion’s origin and defeat the vegetables that are haunting the villagers, bringing everything back to normal. Features Cartoony medieval and fantasy-themed 2D run-and-gun platformer Play cooperatively with the supported 2-player Local coop mode Featured abilities: fast speed, quick-dash ability, and powerful magic projectiles! Languages: English, Spanish, Finish, Polish, Catalan, Basque About Development This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
